attributes.action: Consider convicted criminals to undergo a national service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that criminals who are found / plead guilty should be forced to undergo a 'National Service' type army training, which would morelikely make them employable again and help our overcrowding in prisons, not to mention help our countries defence situation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
